name: Captaining the demise
description:
We have lost all power...

The order is to evacuate the ship but enemies are closing in.

take control of the point defense gun and defend your broken ship.

Controls:

Mouse = Aim + fire

a + d = turn

w = evac people

s = Jettison cargo

try to keep vital systems online for as long as possible. I have added a list of the different ship modules to your h.u.d. and the latest intel of the situation!

And captain... good luck!
